## Almond cookies `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

60ml [aquafaba](#sec-aquafaba) \
225g ground almonds \
160g caster sugar \
almond extract \
flaked almonds \

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
13-15mins \
24 cookies

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Mix sugar and ground almonds.
1. Whisk [aquafaba](#sec-aquafaba) with fork until light, frothy and foamy, about 2 mins.
1. Mix all together.
1. Roll, then press slightly in flaked almonds, both sides
1. Bake.

*Notes*

- Nice, but make them small since sweet and dry.

## Bourbons `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

200g butter \
100g caster sugar \
2tbsp cocoa \
280g P flour \

Filling: \
75g butter \
100g icing sugar \
2tbsp custard powder \
2tbsp cocoa powder \
30g melted dark chocolate

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

160° \
15-20mins \
30 small sandwiches

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Cream sugar and butter.
1. Stir in dry and mix to dough.
1. Chill 30mins.
1. Roll to 0.5cm thick, cut, prick, bake. 
1. For filling, cream sugar and butter first.

*Notes*

- "Like a bourbon, but good!";
- Freezing changes the texture - do not recommend.

![](pictures/bourbons-01.jpg)

##  Hobnobs `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

75g butter \
75g caster sugar \
1/2tbsp syrup \
75g wholemeal flour \
150g oats \
1/2 tsp B of S

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
10mins \
15 cookies

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Beat butter and sugar.
1. Mix in syrup.
1. Add mixed dry to wet a bit at a time -> crumbly mix.
1. Press mixture into a 6.5cm cookie cutter and compress
1. Bake and top.

*Notes*

- A bit too sweet, so needs that dark chocolate - could try reducing sugar?
- Used ~60g chocolate to cover.
- 2tbsp mix per biscuit.
- Like crumble mix.

![](pictures/hobknobs-01.jpg)

## Lebkuchen `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

7oz runny honey \
3oz butter \
7oz P flour \
3.5oz ground almonds \
1tsp BP \
1/4tsp B of S \
1.5tsp cinnamon \
1.5tsp ginger \
1tsp mixed spice \
(0.5tsp nutmeg/allspice/..) \
half zest and juice of orange \
200g chocolate

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
15mins \
18 cookies

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Melt honey and butter, then cool 5 mins in fridge.
1. Add remaining then chill for at least an hour.
1. Roll with damp hands.
1. Bake, cool, dip.

*Notes*

- "Like a jaffa cake".
- Used 108g chocolate to coat bottoms

## Lemon sandwich biscuits `r vegan` {#sec-lemon-biscuits}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

150g butter \
1 lemon zest \
85g caster sugar \
1 egg yolk (optional) \
280g P flour \
1tbsp cornflour \

Filling: \
75g butter \
130g icing sugar \
2tbsp [lemon curd](#sec-lemon-curd).

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
14-16mins \
20 sandwiches

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Cream sugar, butter, zest 2-3 mins until pale and creamy.
1. Beat in egg yolk 1 min.; Mix in flour -> clumps.
1. Bring to ball, roll to 3-4mm thick, chill at least an hour.
1. Cut, bake.
1. Beat buttercream 3-5mins until very pale and creamy before adding lemon curd.

*Notes*

- Can top with simple lemon icing.

##  Nankhatai `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

3 green cardamom pods \
40g icing sugar \
100g butter \
70g SR flour \
25g semolina \
25g gram flour \
pinch salt \
almonds

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

140° \
20mins \
24 cookies

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Grind cardamom seeds with 1tsp icing sugar.
1. Beat butter, sugar, cardamom until light and creamy about 10mins.
1. Marble-sized balls.
1. Flatten slightly with almond.
1. Chill 20 mins before baking.

*Notes*

- Delicate flavour and light biscuit.

##  Viennese biscuits `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

250g butter \
50g icing sugar \
225g P flour \
25g cornflour 

Filling:\
100g butter \
200g icing sugar

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

170° \
10-15mins \
30 small whirls \
18 small fingers

![](pictures/viennese-biscuits-03.jpg)

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Lots beating to pale and fluffy.
1. Then sieve flours and beat until well mixed.
1. Pipe and bake.

*Notes*

- To make jam use 160g raspberries and 200g jam sugar. 
- 100g dark chocolate to dip.
